data.title: Bangladesh Public Procurement Authority
data.text:
5 Ministry of Road Transport and Bridges

Roads & Highways Department (RHD) 02/RHD/SE/RDSC/2022-2023

Invitation for the signing of Contract Invitation for the signing of Contract to carry out “Selection of National Consultant for Operation of Traffic Management Center (TMC) under "Improving the Reliability and Safety on National Highways Corridors of Bangladesh by Introduction of Intelligent Transport Systems (ITS)"” (Package no. PS-1) [Ref. No. 02/RHD/SE/RDSC/2022-2023] UDC Construction Limited and UCCL The United Construction Company Ltd. and VaaaN Infra Private Limited. JV House# 116, (10th Floor), Road# 11, Block-E, Banani, Dhaka-1213, e-mail address: udc.uccl.vaaanjv@gmail.com 31/07/2024 10 Ministry of Post, Telecommunications & Information Technology

Teletalk Bangladesh Limited 14.35.0000.460.07.026.22/165

Supply, Installations and Integration of Groundings, MDB and Fire Fighting Systems at 103 (One Hundred and Three) Sites in Dhaka and Mymensingh Zone (Lot-1) Notification of Award of Supply, Installations and Integration of Groundings, MDB and Fire Fighting Systems at 103 (One Hundred and Three) Sites in Dhaka and Mymensingh Zone (Lot-1) under the project of Expansion of Teletalk’s network up to rural areas and Network readiness for 5G Services Concrete & Steel Technologies Ltd. 23, Adarsha Chayaneer Housing society Ring Road, Shyamoli, Dhaka-1207 11/07/2024
